synopsis.text: The unconventional and diaper-clad Milk-chan, residing in a milk bottle-shaped abode with her eccentric crew - the anxious robot Tetsuko, the philosophical slug Hanage, and the unpredictable Robodog - leads a life full of absurd adventures. As a secret agent for the enigmatic President, Milk-chan tackles bizarre cases ranging from curbing a counterfeiter's Belgian waffle cravings to rehabilitating inebriated marine life. While saving the day, this mischievous gang must also dodge their relentless landlord due to their unpaid rent. With its humorous and cynical tone, this anime presents a delightful blend of absurdity and fun, promising a thrilling ride for its viewers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
